name: Stantler
flavorText:
The curved antlers
subtly change the
flow of air to create a strange
space where real­
ity is distorted.

previous.name: Porygon2
previous.flavorText:
This upgraded
version of PORYGON
is designed for space exploration.
It can't fly,
though.

next.name: Smeargle
next.flavorText:
A special fluid
oozes from the tip
of its tail. It paints the fluid
everywhere to mark
its territory.

pokemon.name: Stantler
pokemon.flavorText:
The curved antlers
subtly change the
flow of air to create a strange
space where real­
ity is distorted.

pokemon.name: Wyrdeer
pokemon.flavorText:
The black orbs shine with an uncanny light when the Pokémon is
erecting invisible barriers. The fur shed from its beard retains
heat well and is a highly useful material for winter clothing.
